summaryDetail.addTechniqueOrTemplate: Add your own technique or insert a template
summaryDetail.describeHowToMemorize: Describe how you will memorize this content (steps, mental images, spaced repetition, etc.)

templates.loci:
# Loci Method (memory palace)
1) Choose a place you know very well.
2) Divide the summary into 8-12 key ideas.
3) Assign each idea to a locus and create a vivid image.
4) Mentally walk through the itinerary.
5) Spaced review: 10 min, 1 day, 3 days, 1 week.
templates.feynman:
# Feynman Technique
1) Write the topic as if explaining it to a child.
2) Detect gaps where you use jargon.
3) Return to the source and rewrite with simple words.
4) Create an example and an everyday analogy.
5) Repeat until you can explain it in 2 minutes without looking.
templates.acronym:
# Acronym / Acrostic
1) Take the key words from the summary.
2) Extract initials and form an acronym.
3) Reinforce with a mental image.
4) Practice recall from the acronym.
templates.flashcards:
# Flashcards + Spaced Repetition
1) Divide the summary into questions and answers.
2) Create cards (question/answer).
3) Use spacing algorithm (2d, 4d, 7d...).
4) Mark as difficult what you fail.
5) Self-explain the answer out loud.

agenteIA.pageTitle: AI Agent for Civil Service Exams | Civil Service Prep
agenteIA.metaDescription: AI Agent for Civil Service Exams: personalized plans, summaries, virtual professor, psychotechnics and simulations. Start for free.
agenteIA.heroTitle2: to pass your civil service exam
agenteIA.heroSubtitle: AI-powered study and physical plans, automatic summaries, 24/7 virtual professor and adaptive tests. All in one platform.
agenteIA.personalizedPlansDesc: Calendar by goals, spaced repetition and prioritization by topics and difficulty.
agenteIA.testsSimulationsDesc: Practice by difficulty and time. Correct instantly and adjust the plan based on your results.
agenteIA.virtualProfessor247Desc: Step-by-step explanations, doubt resolution and memorization techniques when you need them.
agenteIA.automaticSummariesDesc: Upload your syllabus and get summaries, diagrams and memory cards. Save time without losing quality.
agenteIA.physicalPrepAIDesc: If your exam requires it, generate a personalized physical plan and track your progress.
agenteIA.startTodayTitle: Start today with your AI Agent
agenteIA.startTodaySubtitle: Define your goal, generate your plan and let AI accompany you until you pass.
agenteIA.faq1Question: What is an AI Agent for Civil Service Exams?
agenteIA.faq1Answer: It's an intelligent assistant that plans your study, creates summaries, proposes tests and answers your questions like a 24/7 tutor.
agenteIA.faq2Question: Can I generate a personalized study plan?
agenteIA.faq2Answer: Yes. Enter your exam, weekly hours and target date, and AI will generate a plan with spaced repetition and priorities.
agenteIA.faq3Question: Does it include psychotechnics and physical preparation?
agenteIA.faq3Answer: It includes psychotechnics exercises and, if your exam requires it, also an AI-adapted physical plan.
agenteIA.faq4Answer: Create your free account, generate your plan and start practicing with tests and simulations.
